Text: I did some tests on an HTC Sensation running ICS, a Samsung running 2.3.3, and a 4.0.3 emulator.  I couldn't get any URL intent handling to work on the HTC, but had no trouble with the Samsung or the emulator.  Any chance you're using an HTC phone?  Apparently HTC's have a problem with this: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/11780090/standard-intent-uri-broken
